ValidationRule.description: WellCare leads must have the group/plan sponsor Wellcare Medicare Advantage
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: And( ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c , "WellCare"), Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "WellCare Medicare Advantage", Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "Call Request" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The group plan sponsor for WellCare leads must be Wellcare Medicare Advantage
